channel.title: Jarred my server with jdk7, Can ppl without jdk7/jre7 use the jar?
channel.description:
I jarred my Client, putted it online.
I did jar it with jdk1.7.0 But I can open it on my own pc on the website, also my vps can load it. But some other guys can't
Is that because i need to re-do the jarring with jdk1.6.0_24
for the ppl who doesn't have any jre7/jdk7??

item.title: Jarred my server with jdk7, Can ppl without jdk7/jre7 use the jar?
item.dc:creator: @DevotionPk DevotionPk
item.description:
@DevotionPk wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

they would need to have the same java version that you jarred it with.

Ah thanks very much man,
Will re jar it with a lower version of java, jdk6
everybody can load that

Read full topic
item.source: Jarred my server with jdk7, Can ppl without jdk7/jre7 use the jar?
